example1.title: Real photo
example1.desc: Photo taken with a smartphone, no AI generation signs detected.

example2.title: AI Portrait
example2.desc: Portrait created with Midjourney. AI artifacts detected in eyes and hair.

example3.title: Authentic video
example3.desc: Video captured with a camera. Natural movement and temporal coherence.

example4.title: Deepfake
example4.desc: AI-generated video. Inconsistencies in facial expressions detected.

example5.title: Mixed content
example5.desc: AI-retouched photo. Mix of real and generated content.

example6.title: AI Landscape
example6.desc: Landscape created with DALL-E. Impossible structures and artificial textures.

welcome.title: Welcome to FakeTect!
welcome.desc: Detect in seconds whether an image or video was AI-generated. Here's how it works.

upload.title: Step 1: Upload
upload.desc: Drag and drop or click to upload your file. Images (JPG, PNG, WEBP) or videos (MP4, MOV) up to 100 MB.
upload.tip: Tip: Long videos are analyzed on the first 60 seconds to optimize costs.

analyze.title: Step 2: Analysis
analyze.desc: Our AI analyzes your file in seconds. We use multiple models for maximum accuracy.
analyze.tip: Multiple sources: Sightengine, Illuminarty, and OpenAI for reliable results.

result.title: Step 3: Result
result.desc: Get a confidence score and a clear verdict: REAL, AI, or UNCERTAIN. Download a PDF certificate to prove authenticity.
result.tip: The PDF certificate includes a QR code and is ideal for official documents.

ready.title: You're ready!
ready.desc: FREE plan: 10 analyses in 30 days. Upgrade to a paid plan for more analyses and advanced features.

banner.title: Cookie Management
banner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. Strictly necessary cookies are always enabled. You can manage your preferences below.
banner.learnMore: Learn more about our Cookie Policy ‚Üí

settings.title: Cookie Preferences

necessary.title: üîí Strictly necessary cookies
necessary.description: Essential for site operation (authentication, security, cart).

preferences.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Preference cookies
preferences.description: Remember your preferences (language, display theme, settings).

analytics.title: üìä Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use the site (Google Analytics with anonymized IP).

functional.title: ‚≠ê Functional cookies
functional.description: Enable advanced and personalized features (history, display preferences).

settings.modifyInfo: You can modify your preferences at any time via the "Manage cookies" link in the footer.

presentation.title: 1. Service presentation
presentation.content: FakeTect (hereinafter "the Service") is a SaaS platform for detecting AI-generated content, published by JARVIS.

acceptance.title: 2. Terms acceptance
acceptance.content: Using the Service implies full acceptance of these Terms of Service (ToS).
acceptance.confirm: By creating an account or using the Service, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these ToS and our Privacy Policy.

services.title: 3. Service description
services.imageAnalysis: Image analysis: AI detection on JPEG, PNG, WEBP, GIF formats
services.videoAnalysis: Video analysis: Detection on MP4, MOV, AVI (first 60 seconds)
services.history: History: Storage of your analyses according to your plan
services.api: REST API: Programmatic access (PRO plans and above)

account.title: 4. Registration and user account
account.eligibility: 4.1. Eligibility: The Service is reserved for adults (18 years and older) or minors with parental authorization.
account.accountInfo: 4.2. Account: You agree to provide accurate information during registration and keep it up to date.
account.security: 4.3. Security: You are responsible for keeping your credentials confidential. Any activity under your account is deemed to be yours.
account.deletion: 4.4. Deletion: You can request account deletion at any time through settings or by email.

pricing.title: 5. Pricing and payment
pricing.freePlan: 5.1. Free plan: 10 analyses over 30 days, no commitment.
pricing.paidPlans: 5.2. Paid plans: Monthly or annual billing via Stripe. Prices include all taxes for individuals.
pricing.renewal: 5.3. Renewal: Subscriptions are automatically renewed. You can cancel at any time.
pricing.refund: 5.4. Refund: In accordance with withdrawal rights, refund possible within 14 days of subscription (excluding service consumption).

usage.title: 6. Acceptable use
usage.intro: It is forbidden to use the Service for:
usage.harm: Harming others or damaging their reputation
usage.reverse: Attempting to reverse-engineer or copy our algorithms
usage.resell: Reselling access to the Service without authorization

ip.title: 7. Intellectual property
ip.ownership: 7.1. Our rights: FakeTect, its logo, algorithms, and interface are protected by copyright and trademark law.
ip.userContent: 7.2. Your content: You retain all rights to the files you upload. We only use them to provide the Service.
ip.license: 7.3. Limited license: You have a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Service.

liability.title: 8. Liability
liability.accuracy: 8.1. Accuracy: Our analyses are based on statistical probabilities. We do not guarantee 100% detection.
liability.availability: 8.2. Availability: We strive to ensure maximum availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted service.
liability.damages: 8.3. Damages: Our liability is limited to the amount of your subscription over the last 12 months.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.byUser: 9.1. By user: You can terminate at any time through your account settings.
termination.byUs: 9.2. By us: We may suspend or terminate your access for ToS violations, non-payment, or suspicious activity.
termination.effects: 9.3. Effects: Termination results in deletion of your data according to our retention policy.

law.title: 10. Applicable law
law.jurisdiction: These ToS are governed by French law. Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent courts of Cr√©teil, France.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these ToS, please contact us.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR.

payment.title: Payment data
payment.note: Bank details are never stored on our servers. They are processed directly by Stripe (PCI-DSS Level 1 certified).

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.contract: Contract execution: To provide our services
legalBasis.legitimate: Legitimate interest: To improve our services
legalBasis.legal: Legal obligation: For tax and regulatory compliance

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.analyses: Analyses: According to your plan (30 days free, 1 year paid)

rights.title: Your GDPR Rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.access: Right of access: Obtain a copy of your data
rights.rectification: Right to rectification: Correct your data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure: Delete your data
rights.portability: Right to portability: Retrieve your data
rights.opposition: Right to object: Refuse certain processing
rights.howTo: To exercise these rights, contact our DPO.

transfers.title: Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your data may be transferred to processors located outside the EU, with appropriate safeguards (standard contractual clauses).

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: For more information about our use of cookies, see our Cookie Policy.

whatIs.title: What is a cookie?
whatIs.content: A cookie is a small text file placed on your device when visiting a website. It allows recognizing your browser, remembering your preferences, and analyzing site usage.

necessary.title: Strictly necessary cookies
necessary.description: Essential for site operation. Cannot be disabled.

preferences.title: Preference cookies
preferences.description: Remember your choices (language, theme, display settings).

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use the site.
analytics.note: Google Analytics is configured with IP anonymization (GDPR compliant).

manage.title: Manage your preferences
manage.content: You can change your cookie preferences at any time via the "Manage cookies" button in the footer.
manage.browser: You can also configure your browser to block cookies, but some site features may no longer work.

validity.title: Validity period
validity.content: Your consent is valid for 13 months in accordance with GDPR recommendations.

editor.title: Website publisher
editor.content: The website faketect.com is published by JARVIS, SAS with a share capital of 1,000 EUR.

director.title: Publication director
director.content: The publication director is the legal representative of JARVIS.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.frontend: Frontend: Vercel Inc., 340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA
hosting.backend: Backend: Render Services, Inc., San Francisco, CA, USA

ip.title: Intellectual property
ip.content: All site content (texts, images, logos, algorithms) is protected by copyright. Any reproduction is prohibited without prior authorization.

featuresSection.title: Powerful detection engine

cta.title: Ready to secure your content?
